remarks: Two atoms are unequal iff their join is greater than one of them. (Contributed by NM, 6-May-2012.)
statement:
atlt.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
atlt.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atlt.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atlt $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ P e. A /\ Q e. A ) -> ( P .< ( P .\/ Q ) <-> P =/= Q ) ) $.
